message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, given your needs. I'm asking for $13,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below what I had in mind. This product offers you a lot of value, and I'm confident it will more than pay for itself.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to offer $11,000 for it.
